slides.content:
# Window Functions ğŸªŸ

## Concept

Calculate across rows related to current row.

```sql
SELECT 
    name,
    sales,
    SUM(sales) OVER (PARTITION BY region) as region_total,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY sales DESC) as sales_rank
FROM sales_table;
```

## Common Functions

| Function | Purpose |
|----------|--------|
| ROW_NUMBER() | Unique row number |
| RANK() | Rank with gaps |
| DENSE_RANK() | Rank without gaps |
| LAG/LEAD | Previous/next row |

slides.title: CTEs
slides.content:
# CTEs (WITH Clause) ğŸ“

## Readable Subqueries

```sql
WITH regional_sales AS (
    SELECT region, SUM(sales) as total
    FROM orders
    GROUP BY region
)
SELECT * 
FROM regional_sales
WHERE total > 1000000;
```

## Benefits

- Readable
- Reusable within query
- Recursive capability
